meanings.definition: The quality or state of being obnoxious.
meanings.sent1: Her obnoxiousnesses made it hard to enjoy the party.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the obnoxiousnesses of his jokes.
meanings.sent3: The obnoxiousnesses of the loud music was like a constant headache.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxiousnesses of the situation hit me like a wave of irritation.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxiousnesses of his behavior lingered in the room long after he left.

meanings.sent1: The obnoxiousnesses of his teasing crossed the line.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't tolerate the obnoxiousnesses of his comments.
meanings.sent3: His obnoxiousnesses at the dinner table were met with eye rolls.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxiousnesses of his attitude stung like a bee.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxiousnesses of his behavior echoed in the room.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being unpleasant or objectionable.
meanings.sent1: The obnoxiousnesses of the smell made her cringe.
meanings.sent2: The movie's obnoxiousnesses turned off many viewers.
meanings.sent3: The obnoxiousnesses of the situation were hard to ignore.
meanings.sent4: The obnoxiousnesses of the weather dampened everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: The obnoxiousnesses of the taste lingered on his tongue.
